# Information Gain
- In decision forests, the difference between a node's [entropy](Entropy.qmd) and the weighted (by number of examples) sum of the [entropy](Entropy.qmd) of its children nodes. A node's [entropy](Entropy.qmd) is the [entropy](Entropy.qmd) of the examples in that node.
